name: Slow Cooker Teriyaki Pulled Chicken
author: A Day In the Kitchen
summary: Tender pulled teriyaki chicken, simple to make and perfect with rice and vegetables or in a crusty bun.
ingredients: ¼ cup reduced-sodium tamari or low-sodium soy sauce
directions: Combine chicken pieces, soy sauce, honey, garlic, ginger, and rice vinegar in a slow cooker
Cook until chicken is no longer pink in the centers, on Low, 6 to 8 hours, or High for 4 to 6 hours
Remove chicken to a cutting board and shred using 2 forks
Pour liquid from the slow cooker into a small saucepan and heat over low heat
Mix tapioca flour and water in a small bowl to create a slurry and add to the liquid
Simmer until sauce has thickened to desired consistency, 3 to 5 minutes
Pour sauce over pulled chicken and mix well
